dublin_core.dcvalue: Intraoperative testing of cochlear implant devices establishment of electrical threshold for acoustic reflex and recording neural responses to electrical stimulation have traditionally required the presence of a cochlear implant audiologist in the operating room The goal of this study was to determine the feasibility of remote testing to improve time efficiency and reduce cost
Otology And neurotology : official publication of the American Otological Society, American Neurotology Society [and] European Academy of Otology and Neurotology
Remote intraoperative monitoring during cochlear implant surgery is feasible and efficient.
